description: JSON map of the AP Statistics Unit 6 HTML page structure and functionality.
pageTitle: AP Statistics Unit 6: Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions

head.title: AP Statistics Unit 6: Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions

internalStyles.description: Inline CSS for tab visibility and button styling.

body.description: Main content area of the page.

content.title: AP Statistics Unit 6: Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions (h1)
content.subtitle: Tools and guides... (p)
content.examWeightInfo: Displays exam weight (12-15%) in a highlighted div.

sections.description: Horizontal list of buttons to switch between content tabs.
sections.functionality: Clicking a tab button adds 'active' class to it, removes from others, and shows the corresponding content div while hiding others (via CSS and JS). Flowchart rendering is triggered when its tab is selected.

content.description: Displays an interactive learning flow guide.

componentDetails.purpose: Guides users through a multi-step learning process using Grok.
features: Icons and titles for each step

content.title: AP Statistics Learning Session Flowchart (h2)
content.legend: Color-coded legend explaining flowchart node colors (Setup, Video, Practice, Progress, Capstone).

content.title: Start Your Grok Session (h2)
content.instructionalNote: Explains the '(+)' symbol for video backups.

instructions.title: 2. Video Learning Guide (h3)
instructions.steps: Lists steps to use the prompt with Grok and PDFs.

helpSection.title: Need Help?
helpSection.link: Links to a YouTube tutorial video.

currentTopicBox.dynamicContentSource: Populated by JS function 'updateCurrentTopicInfo' based on 'pdfFiles' data and user progress (localStorage).

completionButton.functionality: Marks the current topic as complete (updates 'pdfFiles' and localStorage via 'markTopicAsCompleted'), then updates UI. Becomes 'Reset Progress' when all done.

quickAccessBox.dynamicContentSource: Populated by JS function 'populateQuickAccessTopics' based on 'pdfFiles' data.
quickAccessBox.displays: Grid of small cards for each topic, showing name, status icon, and links (PDFs/Videos). Clicking sets the topic as current.
quickAccessBox.completionState: Shows a special 'All Topics Completed' message and highlights the capstone when finished.

content.title: AP Statistics Study Materials (h2)
content.descriptionText: Instructions for using PDFs with Grok.
content.instructionalNote: Explains the '(+)' symbol for video backups.

allCompletedMessage.visibility: Initially hidden, shown by 'checkAllTopicsCompleted' JS function when all topics are marked complete.

resetButton.functionality: Calls 'resetProgress' JS function to clear localStorage and reset UI.

grokPromptCTABanner.description: Static banner encouraging users to switch to the Grok Prompt tab.

topicSelector.functionality: On change, scrolls the view to the selected topic card.

progressBar.updatedBy: JS function 'updateProgressBar' based on completion status in 'pdfFiles'.

topicCards.dynamicContentSource: Populated by 'populateTopicCards' JS function, creating cards using 'createTopicCard' based on 'pdfFiles' data.

cardStructure.styling: Varies based on completion status (green), current status (blue), capstone status (red).
cardStructure.completionButton: Present if not completed (unless capstone locked), calls 'markTopicAsCompleted' on click.

nextTopicSection.visibility: Initially hidden, shown by 'updateNextTopic' if not all topics are complete.
nextTopicSection.content: Displays the next incomplete topic card (created by 'createTopicCard').

javascript.description: Handles interactivity, dynamic content rendering, state management, and external library initialization.

keyVariables.name: flowchartDefinition
keyVariables.purpose: Holds Mermaid syntax for the flowchart.

keyVariables.name: grokPrompt
keyVariables.purpose: Holds the text prompt for the Grok AI.

keyVariables.name: pdfFiles
keyVariables.purpose: Core data structure (Array of Objects). Holds details for each topic: id, name, description, PDF paths, video URLs (main and alternative), completion status, current status, capstone flag.

keyFunctions.name: createTopicCard
keyFunctions.purpose: Generates HTML string for a topic card based on data.

keyFunctions.name: populateTopicCards
keyFunctions.purpose: Clears and refills the topic card container using 'createTopicCard'.

keyFunctions.name: updateProgressBar
keyFunctions.purpose: Updates the width and text of the progress bar.

keyFunctions.name: updateNextTopic
keyFunctions.purpose: Shows/hides and updates the 'Next Topic' section.

keyFunctions.name: checkAllTopicsCompleted
keyFunctions.purpose: Checks if all topics in 'pdfFiles' are marked complete, updates UI elements accordingly.

keyFunctions.name: markTopicAsCompleted
keyFunctions.purpose: Updates the 'completed' status for a topic in 'pdfFiles', updates 'current' status, saves progress, and refreshes UI.

keyFunctions.name: resetProgress
keyFunctions.purpose: Resets 'completed' and 'current' status for all topics, saves, and refreshes UI.

keyFunctions.name: saveTopicProgress
keyFunctions.purpose: Saves the completion/current status of topics to localStorage.

keyFunctions.name: loadTopicProgress
keyFunctions.purpose: Loads topic status from localStorage into the 'pdfFiles' array on page load/tab switch.

keyFunctions.name: updateCurrentTopicInfo
keyFunctions.purpose: Updates the 'Current Topic' box in the Grok Prompt tab.

keyFunctions.name: populateQuickAccessTopics
keyFunctions.purpose: Updates the 'Quick Access' topic list in the Grok Prompt tab.

keyFunctions.name: setTopicAsCurrent
keyFunctions.purpose: Sets a specific topic as the 'current' one, saves, and updates UI.

keyFunctions.name: Tab Switching Logic
keyFunctions.purpose: Handles click events on tab buttons to show/hide content panes.

keyFunctions.name: Copy Button Logic
keyFunctions.purpose: Handles click event on the copy button, copies 'grokPrompt', provides user feedback.

keyFunctions.name: DOMContentLoaded Listener
keyFunctions.purpose: Initializes event listeners, loads progress, populates initial content based on active tab.

reactComponent.name: APStatLearningFlow
reactComponent.purpose: Renders the interactive learning flow guide in the 'Learning Flow' tab.

stateManagement.persistence: Uses `localStorage` ('apStatsTopicProgress' key) to save and load topic completion and current status across sessions.
stateManagement.reactComponentState: Uses React's `useState` hook for internal step tracking within the Learning Flow component.
